item.title: About
item.description: Kazufumi Yamana, Ph.D. (Economics) Social service activities 2017.4 - Assistant professor, Kanagawa University, Faculuty of Economics Visiting researcher, Policy Research Institute, Ministry of Finance, Japanese Government 2015.4 - 2017.3 Economist, Policy Research Institute, Ministry of Finance, Japanese Government Research interests Computational statistics / Machine learning Computational economics Macroeconomics Nekonomics Language Python Matlab R Preference Vim, Tab Editor war Tabs vs Spaces Lecture Kanagawa University Macroeconomics (2019, 2018, 2017) Microeconomics (2019, 2018, 2017) Economic data processing (2015) The University of Tokyo (GraSPP) Principles of Macroeconomics (2019) Ministry of Finance Introduction to statistics (2019, 2018, 2017) Applied econometrics (2019, 2018) Statistics (2018, 2016) Time series econometrics (2017, 2016, 2015) Tokyo Institute of Technology Economics A (2016) Chiba University Economic statistics (2017, 2016)
